#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Celebrate Friday the 13th
#Text=Only around 10 percent of modern-day Americans believe that Friday the 13th is an unlucky day , yet it is still a well recognized superstition .
#Text=If you want to have some fun on Friday the 13th , there are many things you can do to mark the day .
#Text=Take advantage of any local events , like events at museums .
#Text=Have a party where you eat spooky food and watch scary movies .
#Text=You can also plan fun activities , like ghost hunting , somewhat related to the day .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Taking Advantage of Local Events and Attractions
#Text=See if there are any local events planned .
#Text=Some towns may have events planned around the community for Friday the 13th .
#Text=You can search online , typing in something like " local Friday the 13th events , " or look for flyers at a local community center .
#Text=Something like a potluck , cookout , or free movie screening , can be a fun way to spend the day .
#Text=Check out spooky or odd local museums .
#Text=Look up the various museums in your area and see if you find anything spooky or odd .
#Text=Maybe there 's a museum of medical history in your area .
#Text=Maybe there 's a museum of oddities .
#Text=Something like Ripley 's Believe It Or Not , for example , can be fun to do on Friday the 13th .
#Text=Museums may also host local events on the date .
#Text=For example , maybe a local history museum is having a special exhibit or talk about the history of Friday the 13th .
#Text=Take a tour of local hauntings and legends .
#Text=Look into your own town 's quirky history .
#Text=Figure out some superstitions , or allegedly haunted sites , and give them a visit on the day .
#Text=See if there are any guided tours in your area that feature local oddities .
#Text=Look into local superstitions .
#Text=For example , maybe there 's an old playground where people believe you can make wishes .
#Text=This would be a great place to visit on Friday the 13th .
#Text=Find local deals and specials .
#Text=Some businesses may have deals or specials to mark the day .
#Text=A local bar , for example , may have special Friday the 13th themed drinks .
#Text=A local restaurant may have half-off appetizers or special food for the day .
#Text=See if you can go out to a local business and save some money while enjoying food and drink specials for the day .
#Text=If you 're interested in getting a tattoo , check out tattoo parlors .
#Text=Many tattoo parlors offer discounts on Friday the 13th-themed tattoos .
#Text=Having a Party
#Text=Decorate with spooky or dark-themed items .
#Text=As Friday the 13th is believed to be a day marked by bad luck , opt for spooky decorations .
#Text=Pick a variety of decorations in colors like black , gray , and red to give off a spooky , ominous feel .
#Text=For example , find wreathes made out of black and gray flowers to give off a deadly , creepy look .
#Text=Cut pieces of red felt into the shapes of droplets .
#Text=Glue them onto a long piece of string to make a blood drop garland .
#Text=Make use of your own bookshelf for decorations .
#Text=Pull out copies of horror stories , like the works of Poe , to display at your party .
#Text=Watch Friday the 13th-themed movies .
#Text=You can try watching films from the Friday the 13th franchise at your party .
#Text=You can also just watch horror movies in general to give off the spooky feel of the day .
#Text=For example , watch horror classics like The Exorcist and Rosemary 's Baby .
#Text=Play games with a dark or superstitious twist .
#Text=Put a spooky twist on classic games .
#Text=For example , look for trivia games online that have questions centered around horror and superstition .
#Text=Play a game like Truth or Dare that pushes people out of their comfort zone .
#Text=Try doing a game of Pictionary where you have to draw spooky pictures .
#Text=Make a Friday the 13th playlist .
#Text=Many bands , such as Everlast and Deer Tick , have songs called " Friday the 13th " that would be appropriate to add to a playlist for your party .
#Text=You can also add songs about the day Friday , such as humorous choices like Rebecca Black 's " Friday . "
#Text=Generally spooky sounding songs ( e.g. , hauntings , true crime , and real life disasters ) can also fit on a Friday the 13th mix .
#Text=Add something like , " The Wreck of the Edmund Fitzgerald . "
#Text=Websites like Spotify , Pandora , and YouTube may have ready made Friday the 13th playlists .
#Text=Make dark and spooky refreshments .
#Text=Make dark refreshments , such as cupcakes , cakes , and cookies with black frosting .
#Text=You can also use cookie cutters to cut out cookies into shapes of bad omens like black cats and full moons .
#Text=Try to make 13 of each refreshment for an extra fun twist at the party .
#Text=However , make sure you have enough snacks to go around .
#Text=Planning Fun Activities
#Text=Go ghost hunting .
#Text=Get a group of friends together to explore haunted ares in your home .
#Text=You can go on your own ghost hunting trip where you explore places like old theaters , parks , and other allegedly haunted areas in your hometown in search of paranormal activity .
#Text=Make sure you only go in areas open to the public .
#Text=You do n't want to hamper your day by getting in trouble for trespassing .
#Text=Buy a lottery ticket .
#Text=While Friday the 13th is thought of as an unlucky day , many people find it funny and ironic to buy a lottery ticket .
#Text=This is a way of showing you wo n't let superstition get to you .
#Text=Splurge on something like a scratch off ticket at a local gas station and see if you win any money .
#Text=Do some feng shui .
#Text=Feng shui is the art of designing furniture in a room to bring in good vibes and expel any bad energy .
#Text=As Friday the 13th is thought to be unlucky , this can be a fun activity to do with a friend on the day .
#Text=Stop by your local library and buy a book on feng shui or look up the basics online .
#Text=Spend the afternoon doing some redecorating .
#Text=Make 13 cookies or other baked good .
#Text=If you love baking , spend the afternoon of Friday the 13th making cookies or another baked goods .
#Text=Make 13 of your baked good to celebrate the day and then share your food with friends and family members .
#Text=If you do n't like baking , you can buy 13 of a particular baked good .
#Text=Stop by a bakery , for example , and get a baker 's dozen of donuts .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Avoid scaring people who are clearly worried about the day .
